title: Three onion pie with feta or goat cheese
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 red onion, chopped', '2 tablespoons dry white wine', '2 leeks, whites only, sliced into rings', '2 eggs, beaten', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh tarragon', '75g crumbled feta cheese', '1 plum tomato, thinly sliced', '100g fine dried breadcrumbs', 'ground black pepper to taste']
